dbVersion.data: MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'TASK_PROPS.BIZ_DOMIAN' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '业务流程的主业务域', 'TASK_PROPS.BIZ_DOMIAN', 'IT')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'TASK_PROPS.TASK_IP' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '业务流程的ip端口', 'TASK_PROPS.TASK_IP', 'http://172.16.61.87:8080')
MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'MR_PROPS.TAG_ID' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '系统的tagId', 'MR_PROPS.TAG_ID', '1012')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'MR_PROPS.SCHOOL_CODE' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '学校的code', 'MR_PROPS.SCHOOL_CODE', 'wisedu')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'COMMON_PROPS.RES_SERVER' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '公共资源的地址', 'COMMON_PROPS.RES_SERVER', 'http://res.wisedu.com')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'TASK_PROPS.TASK_CENTER_API' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '任务中心获取API的url', 'TASK_PROPS.TASK_CENTER_API', 'http://task.wisedu.com/emap_wisebpm/sys/taskCenter')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'TASK_PROPS.APP_REDIRECT_URL' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '流程业务填报跳转的地址', 'TASK_PROPS.APP_REDIRECT_URL', 'http://wisebpm.wisedu.com/WiseBpm/form-runtime/app.html?appid=')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'TASK_PROPS.REMAIND_BACK' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '流程的系统消息是否开启', 'TASK_PROPS.REMAIND_BACK', 'YES')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS T USING (SELECT 'STATISTIC_SWITCH' KEY FROM dual) N ON (T.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(NAME, WID, XT, VALUE, KEY) VALUES ('是否开启百度统计功能', SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', 'OFF', 'STATISTIC_SWITCH')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS T USING (SELECT 'STATISTIC_KEY' KEY FROM dual) N ON (T.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(NAME, WID, XT, VALUE, KEY) VALUES ('百度统计的key', SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '737a4cbfd8e69f87ce2ae9394f26ea76', 'STATISTIC_KEY')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'RESTFUL.HOST' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '服务总线restful请求API的Url', 'RESTFUL.HOST', 'http://crowdapi.wisedu.com')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'RESTFUL.APP_ID' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '服务总线restful申请API的appId', 'RESTFUL.APP_ID', 'baseApp')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS PROP USING (SELECT 'RESTFUL.ACCESS_TOKEN' KEY FROM dual) N ON (PROP.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT VALUES ( SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '服务总线restful申请API的accessToken', 'RESTFUL.ACCESS_TOKEN', '6F2AF1916AE5FA8B368FFBEC4541FF3B')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS T USING (SELECT 'SCHOOL_NAME' KEY FROM dual) N ON (T.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(NAME, WID, XT, VALUE, KEY) VALUES ('学校名字', SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', '金智大学', 'SCHOOL_NAME')

MERGE INTO T_itpub_PROPS T USING (SELECT 'PUBLIC_SERVER_PREFIX' KEY FROM dual) N ON (T.KEY = N.KEY) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(NAME, WID, XT, VALUE, KEY) VALUES ('公共服务的服务器前缀', SYS_GUID(), 'itpub', 'http://localhost:8080/publicapp/sys', 'PUBLIC_SERVER_PREFIX')
